resources.string:
A crash has occurred in the application.

Below are the details of the device. The error log has been attached as a file for your reference. We would appreciate your assistance in resolving this issue.

Device Information: 
[PLEASE fill in the information below also removing anything between the square brackets or this will be ignored.]

- App Version: [11.11.11]
- Android Version: [Apple 1.16]
- Device Name: [Android Apple Phone 69]
- Install Location: [Github, Fdroid, Obtanium, Tesla Space Station]

Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

Thank you.
